title: ‘This is wrong’: Team USA curler speaks out on Minnesota ICE raids during Olympics
summary_full: Team USA curler Rich Ruohonen used an Olympic press conference to voice concerns about immigration enforcement actions in his home state of Minnesota. As an attorney, he emphasized his belief that these events infringe upon basic rights and fairness, drawing parallels to constitutional principles. Ruohonen also commended Minnesotans for their compassion during this challenging time.
